actions.abilityText: I & [B]: Prevent the targeted monster from switching.
When an enemy monster switches, that monster is dealt 3[ATK] and discard this aura. If all time counters are removed from this aura, [+] [+].
[2]: The targeted monster gains a leech condition. ~LEECH~
This attack deals +2[ATK] when this monster has a lockdown counter on it.

buffs.buffText: This monster gains +2[ATK] stat cubes if the targeted monster switches.
This monster gains +2[ATK] stat cubes if the targeted monster switches.
[-] [-]: Attack speeds are reversed this turn (slower moves happen first).

This card has no buff effect.
!: This monster is dealt 1[ATK].

abilityText: At the start of each turn put a lockdown counter on this monster. If this monster has more than one lockdown counter, remove them. While this monster has a lockdown counter on it, enemy monsters cannot use switch actions.
